DOWNGRADE POST

I have the following Old Mill Southern Leaguers that I am open to downgrading. 
These all have INCREDIBLE eye appeal, so I would be looking for their equal in a 1-1.5 grade. 
I am really only looking for cash to make up the difference here. 
I realize this is a bit of a long shot, but worth the try!
